MilesWeb presents an attractive range of managed and un-managed servers with impressive configurations sans the high cost. Stability, flexibility and power are the basic attributes of these servers. MilesWeb is the most ideal virtual private server hosting destination for the business owners seeking a robust hosting solution and fast page load times at economical prices.

All the servers mentioned below are available in the following locations:
  • UK
  • USA
  • India
  • Romania

Come and experience high caliber hosting with MilesWeb!
